summary: Iteration 20: S3 Integration Testing. Backend: 10/10 tests passed (100%). Frontend: Login, navigation, and UI all working correctly. S3 integration fully functional for both Doc and Meeting attachments.

Doc attachment download (presigned URL).notes: Returns 307 redirect to S3 presigned URL

Meeting attachment download (presigned U.notes: Returns 307 redirect to S3 presigned URL

critical_code_review_comments: S3 service (/app/backend/app/services/s3.py) well implemented with proper error handling
s3_enabled() check correctly validates all required config vars before enabling S3
Presigned URLs use 1-hour expiry which is reasonable
All upload routes correctly check s3_enabled() and fallback to local storage if S3 not configured
Delete operations properly clean up S3 objects when s3_key is present
Download endpoints correctly use RedirectResponse to presigned URL
seed_data_creation: Test folders and projects created during testing (TEST_ prefix) cleaned up by tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: S3 integration fully tested and working. All file uploads (doc attachments, meeting attachments, PDFs, images) store to Timeweb S3 at https://s3.twcstorage.ru. Downloads redirect to presigned URLs. Delete operations clean up S3 objects.
